attributes.action: Discuss in parliament a CANZUK union.
attributes.additional_details:
A CANZUK international poll conducted in 2017 suggests that 64% of the British population support freedom of movement between the CANZUK nations, it also states that 77% of Canadians, 72% of Australians, and 81% of New Zealanders share this view.
It is also essential that western powers form closer bonds to resist the influence of bad actors on the international stage and with Brexit, this could represent a new opportunity for a more global Britain.
attributes.background: Debate in parliament the government’s position on the formation of a CANZUK(Canada, Australia, New Zealand, United Kingdom) union which would seek to strengthen relations with, and provide free movement and trade between CANZUK countries.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554372
